title: Kasulaperu Inspired Floral Nakshi Necklace with Kempu & Emerald Pendant
materials: Natural Emeralds. Gold showcases a subtle antique Hyderabadi Polish.
features: Inspired by the classic Kasulaperu coin necklace, this short haaram features a delicate floral design throughout the chain, each flower studded with sparkling natural diamonds. The pendant showcases intricate Nakshi work, with a central pear-shaped Emerald, surrounded by vibrant Kempu rubies. Dangling gold beads add a touch of traditional charm.
colors: Diamond White. The Kempu and Emeralds create a vibrant
traditional color palette cherished in South Indian jewelry.
occasions: or as a statement piece for festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranti. Also suitable for contemporary events where a touch of tradition is desired.
description: This necklace seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The intricate Nakshi work and high-quality gemstones make it a valuable heirloom piece. The adjustable chain ensures a comfortable fit for any neckline. A timeless piece of art crafted with Hyderabadi finesse.
